effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 710,795 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 294,624.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant 7,831 primary stat for 20 sec.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Increases your Intellect by 10% and your Stamina by 15% when in Arenas, Battlegrounds, and War Mode.

spells.description:
Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.9 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
